description: Baba ghanoush is the perfect party platter dip, drizzled with spicy harissa and served with crispy pita chips.
name: Spiced Baba Ghanoush & Pita Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the grill to the highest setting and place the eggplants on a baking sheet under the grill for 40 minutes, turning halfway through cooking.
Place the eggplants in a large bowl covered with cling film to cool, then peel the blackened skin off and place the flesh back into the bowl. Heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced.
Mix the spices, lemon juice, tahini, half the oil and garlic into the bowl with the eggplant combine, breaking up any large chunks with a wooden spoon.
Chop the pita breads into triangles and toss in the remaining oil in a large bowl with the salt. Lay the pita chips on a baking sheet and bake for 7-8 minutes, shaking halfway through.
Place the baba ghanoush in a large serving bowl and swirl the harissa on top. Serve surrounded by pita chips.
